attributes.action: vote of no confidence against the liberal democratic party due to non complaince of its own constitution
attributes.additional_details:
violation of constitution by the liberal democratic party vote no confidence


this petition is to call upon the govt to formally accept our vote of 'No Confidence' against the liberal democratic party's leadership for the violation of there constitution. to ask them to stand down.

If you read the Liberal Democratic Party’s constitution in full you will see that they are currently in contravention of almost every part of it .They say that they 'reject all prejudice and discrimination based upon race, colour, religion, age, disability, sex or sexual orientation and oppose all forms of entrenched privilege and inequality. The Spare Room Subsidy is discriminating against fathers and family life. It is ghettoizing the poorest people in society. Support this petition.
